class.name: OpenXRAPIExtension
class.brief_description: Makes the OpenXR API available for GDExtension.
class.description: [OpenXRAPIExtension] makes OpenXR available for GDExtension. It provides the OpenXR API to GDExtension through the [method get_instance_proc_addr] method, and the OpenXR instance through [method get_instance]. It also provides methods for querying the status of OpenXR initialization, and helper methods for ease of use of the API with GDExtension.

method.name: can_render
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if OpenXR is initialized for rendering with an XR viewport.

method.name: get_error_string
method.description: Returns an error string for the given [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrResult.html]XrResult[/url].

method.name: get_instance
method.description: Returns the [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrInstance.html]XrInstance[/url] created during the initialization of the OpenXR API.

method.name: get_instance_proc_addr
method.description: Returns the function pointer of the OpenXR function with the specified name, cast to an integer. If the function with the given name does not exist, the method returns [code]0[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] [code]openxr/util.h[/code] contains utility macros for acquiring OpenXR functions, e.g. [code]GDEXTENSION_INIT_XR_FUNC_V(xrCreateAction)[/code].

method.name: get_next_frame_time
method.description: Returns the timing for the next frame.

method.name: get_play_space
method.description: Returns the play space, which is an [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSpace.html]XrSpace[/url] cast to an integer.

method.name: get_session
method.description: Returns the OpenXR session, which is an [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSession.html]XrSession[/url] cast to an integer.

method.name: get_swapchain_format_name
method.description: Returns the name of the specified swapchain format.

method.name: get_system_id
method.description: Returns the id of the system, which is a [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSystemId.html]XrSystemId[/url] cast to an integer.

method.name: is_running
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if OpenXR is running ([url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/xrBeginSession.html]xrBeginSession[/url] was successfully called and the swapchains were created).

method.name: xr_result
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the provided [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrResult.html]XrResult[/url] (cast to an integer) is successful. Otherwise returns [code]false[/code] and prints the [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrResult.html]XrResult[/url] converted to a string, with the specified additional information.
